post.body: yeah we're staying put too. Cool that you're Greek as well! Full, half? Born here? Me: born there, moved to USA at 5yrsold
snow also coming down in Judkins Park/CD - very small & fine. #seatst
officially, 4pm. Though some report it starting in earnest this evening (~7-8pm). http://bit.ly/Obiz #seatst
yeay!
yep just witnessed it myself. Our street is especially icy, as is the next one. But main streets after that are fine.
Curses! Foiled by the fast food that we cannot have up here!!!
ah, ok. For a minute there I thought it got stuck somewhere or something else action-movie-esque.
whaa? news story?
but what about the faux attitude? :)
*throws a snowball from SEA in your general direction*
thanks for the tweets & all the hard work!
it's probably something silly like "they got out of the emergency exit!" #seatst
I believe there was a third that was alerted before heading down Thomas. A convoy of JobCorps folks, I suppose. #seatst
yeah, I know. They said they were trying to get to Greyhound. That's down Denny. Maybe they took a wrong turn?
likewise sounds yummy :)
*runs around screaming*
wowzers.
aren't DMs only allowed from mutual follow relationships (I follow you, you follow me)?
there's plenty of newspapers online: http://www.hri.org/nodes/grmm.html
straining just takes time, not effort. I recall my mom hanging the bag over one side of the sink for a day or two & that was it
saw this: http://bit.ly/ME7t - assume western side of the island quakes impact eastern side too. Everything OK?
my mom always made Greek yogurt on the stove top + a straining bag, no maker required :)
snowstorm special: $1 Cyrus O'Leary pies at Franz bakery (20th & Jackson). Only open until 4pm today. #seatst
is going to venture out in the icy tundra on foot. Hopefully bank + grocery store will be open. Taking bets that the Starbucks will be.
likes using Opera for a browser. Too bad the add-on market isn't quite there yet as it is for Firefox. Still, considering switching.
is sad that Weekend America is going off the air 1/31/09. I think they could do a short format, online only, for cheap. Who's with me?
I have a happy cat on my lap. Traci has one next to her shoulder. A third is in front of the heater. They apparently like snow days.
is playing with TweetDeck.
is headed back to work.
thinks Superstars of Dance has some neat dancing, but everything else is quite lame & fabricated. Don't ask why he's watching the show.
is making a stuffed butternut squash for dinner.
was off to the grocery store before the flurries started. Hoping he won't encounter a mob of fearful snowpocalyptic shoppers. #seatst
it's not snowing again. It's not snowing again. It's not snowing again. If I keep saying it, it must be true.
NYT on how to save auto industry: http://bit.ly/12J6Z Fun tech, but for now how about just building cars ppl want (mpg, design, reliable)?
dang it, Falcons!! :(
has found the best song in the world: http://bit.ly/BEdP
heard a catfight outside early this morning, and witnessed all 3 of his cats waking up & running to the windows. One did the cat growl, too.
thinks he will finish "In Defense of Food" tonight, and will eat only raw leaves from trees in Judkins Park tomorrow in response.
is back from six arms, full of Nut Brown, and making dinner. Thanks @kgdavis! Hope I was of some help. :)
is (finally) grabbing a beer with @kgdavis later this afternoon.
